content: We continue to partner with counties to improve their IM strategies, showcasing PortalGuard at the National Association of Counties or NACO Annual Conference in Q3, where I participated in a panel about communicating about cybersecurity across your county and cohosting a webinar in September alongside Niko's  CIO; and Adrian County, Missouri, a BIO-key customer on how counties can right-size their cybersecurity programs. Annual recurring revenue for the software licenses increased 5.5% to $918,000 versus $870,000 in Q3 '21, reflecting an increase from the addition of Swivel and in addition to the new PortalGuard customers.
